name: io.github.hannesj/mcp-graphql-schema
description: GraphQL Schema Model Context Protocol Server

tools.name: list-query-fields
tools.description: Lists all available root-level fields for GraphQL queries

tools.name: get-query-field
tools.description: Gets detailed definition for a specific query field in SDL format

tools.name: list-mutation-fields
tools.description: Lists all available root-level fields for GraphQL mutations

tools.name: get-mutation-field
tools.description: Gets detailed definition for a specific mutation field in SDL format

tools.name: list-subscription-fields
tools.description: Lists all available root-level fields for GraphQL subscriptions (if present in schema)

tools.name: get-subscription-field
tools.description: Gets detailed definition for a specific subscription field (if present in schema)

tools.name: list-types
tools.description: Lists all types defined in the GraphQL schema (excluding internal types)

tools.name: get-type
tools.description: Gets detailed definition for a specific GraphQL type in SDL format

tools.name: get-type-fields
tools.description: Gets a simplified list of fields with their types for a specific GraphQL object type

tools.name: search-schema
tools.description: Searches for types or fields in the schema by name pattern (case-insensitive regex)
